faq.question: How to claim this Courses?
faq.answer: You need to first click on Enrol Now and then open a demat account with any one of our partners and then DM us the details on this WhatsApp Number:- +917892541249

faq.question: Is the course in Hindi or English?
faq.answer: Course uses a primary language of Hindi but uses English as well in appropriate places

faq.question: Is it a pre-recorded course or live?
How to access this course?
faq.answer: You need to open a demat account with any one of the brokers, and we will share you the login id and password.

faq.question: Why should I open a Demat Account?
faq.answer: Because our pals Upstox, Dhan and Angel One help us keep the course and Finance Club free for you.

faq.question: What other benefits do I get from this course?
faq.answer: You get access to Finance Club, our elite community of smart investors, where you can connect with fellow investors and our experts to get your queries resolved.
